definitions: A term used to describe a subculture of migrant workers in Shenzhen, China, known for living a minimalist, day-to-day lifestyle with temporary labor.
A member of the 'Sanhe Dashen' group who rejects traditional career paths in favor of extreme leisure and low-cost living.
examples: He lived as a Sanhe God for three years.
The documentary explores the life of a Sanhe God in the industrial district.
